PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Experienced Data Engineer with 6+ years of expertise in building scalable ETL pipelines and managing large-scale data infrastructure. Proficient in Python, Apache Spark, and cloud technologies (AWS). Strong background in SQL and data warehousing solutions.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Senior Data Engineer
Tech Company Inc., San Francisco, CA
January 2022 – Present (2 years)
• Designed and implemented ETL pipeline using Apache Spark processing 500GB+ daily data
• Optimized SQL queries reducing query execution time by 40%
• Led migration of data infrastructure from on-premises to AWS
• Mentored junior engineers on Spark optimization techniques
• Managed Airflow workflows for job orchestration

DataSoft Solutions, New York, NY
June 2018 – December 2021 (3.5 years)
• Developed Python-based data pipelines using Apache Spark and Hadoop
• Implemented MySQL and PostgreSQL schemas for data warehousing
• Created real-time dashboards using Tableau for business intelligence
• Collaborated with analytics team to optimize data models
• Experience with Git version control and Jenkins CI/CD

StartupXYZ, Remote
January 2017 – May 2018 (1.5 years)
• Wrote SQL queries and Python scripts for data extraction and transformation
• Assisted in building distributed data processing systems
